      • checkPermission

        public static boolean checkPermission(android.app.Activity mActivity,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<ChatappPermissionValidator.Constants> rqstedPermissionsList,
                                      int PERMISSION_REQUEST_CODE)
        custom method to check, add and request for run time permissions
        Parameters:
        mActivity: - reference of current activity
        rqstedPermissionsList: - list of the permissions requested
        PERMISSION_REQUEST_CODE: - int type to check the corresponding response on onRequestPermissionsResult
        Returns:
        boolean: true if all requested permissions are already granted else false

      • addPermission

        private static void addPermission(java.lang.String permission,
                                  android.app.Activity mActivity)
        custom method to check whether the requested permission has granted or not If hasn't been granted add to requested list
        Parameters:
        permission: - the requested permission
        mActivity: - current activity reference
